links: Boris Putievskiy, Transformations [Of] Integer Sequences And Pairing Functions, arXiv preprint arXiv:1212.2732, 2012.
example: n=163, the successive iterates applying Euler totient function are as follows: 163,162,54,18,6,2,1. The 5th term is 6, when Phi was applied 4 times. So a(163)=6.
author: _Labos Elemer_
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_ at the suggestion of _Andrew Plewe_, Jun 23 2007
